Title: The Whores
Writer: Claudia Florio, Aurelio Grimaldi (book), Aurelio Grimaldi (screenplay)
Actors: Ida Di Benedetto, Guia Jelo, Lucia Sardo, Sandra Sindoni
Plot: Orlanda, Liuccia, Milù, Blu Blu and Veronica live all in Palermo. And they all are prostitutes (Buttane). We can see them spending their days among clients and desperation. Some got children, some got problems with the pimps, some are more desperate than others, but their destinies are more or less the same.
